entry.title: Tuesday night: A few flurries or rain showers. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: A few flurries and rain showers ending early this evening then clearing. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries late in the afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Tuesday 07 February 2023
